text: Arrigo Bocchi (c.1871 – ?) was a British-Italian film director and producer of the silent era.Low p.149-50 After the First World War Bocchi worked for Windsor Films at the Catford Studios in London as well as shooting films on location in Italy. ==Selected filmography== ===Producer=== * Disraeli (1916) * The Black Night (1916) * A King of the People (1917) * Ora Pro Nobis (1917) ===Director=== * The Slave (1918) * Not Guilty (1919) * The Polar Star (1919) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Low, Rachael. The History of the British Film 1918–1929. George Allen & Unwin, 1971. ==External links== * Category:Year of death unknown Category:1870s births Category:Italian film directors Category:Italian film producers Category:British film directors Category:British film producers Category:Italian emigrants to the United Kingdom
title: Arrigo Bocchi
